memberdef.name: config_test_t0
config_test_t2
config_test_t3
memberdef.initializer:
= { .data = "# line without = ...
" "[bambam]
" "this line isn't any kind of valid
", .set_up = setup_test_config_failing, }

memberdef.name: config_test_t4
memberdef.initializer:
= { .data = "# starting with = ...
" "[bambam]
" "=not valid at all
", .set_up = setup_test_config_failing, }

xrefdescription.para: individual t1 tests should have more descriptive names.
